review: I highly recommend Dr. Sowbhagya B. From the stage of pregnancy to delivery, she has guided us with great care and kindness. But I am not very pleased with the nursing staff as they seemed inattentive at times. While I had some queries about the post delivery precaution, they never really helped me with that. After multiple attempts of probing, I got something in the form of assistance at the end. I understand that they were engaged with some busy work but they should be cooperative with some basic needs. So the hospitality is not that great. *** *** ****** ** **********

Last two consultation was very much convenient and satisfactory. The waiting period was not more than 10 minutes. Just a few tests were suggested as per the requirement and the results were impressive.

Doctor is very much helpful and affectionate to listen all of your problems carefully . 
She will examine you properly .

I visited Manipal hospital for my mother's health check.
She did not even offer us a seat , instead was in extremely hurry. I had taken old reports along with the current one.she did not bother to even check them. 
I asked her if there is no issue with the reports she said it's fine,* ******* *** ****** **** *** ***** ******* According to her having severe pain is normal and it's because of periods ******* ** *** *** ******* *** *** * ******* *** *** ****** ** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ****** ** ****** ***** She takes time to do a thorough checkup. She patiently answered all my questions. She put me at ease.
